addTagDetailsErrors.machine: Please enter a valid machine name (e.g., 5).
addTagDetailsErrors.foundBy: Please enter who found the anomaly.
addTagDetailsErrors.responsiblePerson: Please select the person(s) responsible for resolving the anomaly.
addTagDetailsErrors.actions: Please describe the actions to be taken (minimum 10 characters).
addTagDetailsErrors.deadline: Please select a valid deadline date (must be in the future).

addFpsDetailsErrors.tagNumber: Please enter a valid tag number (e.g., #TAG-123456).
addFpsDetailsErrors.description: Description must be at least 10 characters.
addFpsDetailsErrors.images: Please upload at least one image of the issue.
addFpsDetailsErrors.zone: Please enter a valid zone (e.g., Zone A).
addFpsDetailsErrors.machine: Please enter a valid machine name (e.g., Machine 5).
addFpsDetailsErrors.foundBy: Please enter who found the issue.
addFpsDetailsErrors.responsiblePerson: Please select responsible person(s) for resolving the issue.
addFpsDetailsErrors.actions: Please describe the actions to be taken (minimum 10 characters).
addFpsDetailsErrors.deadline: Please select a valid deadline (must be in the future).
addFpsDetailsErrors.serialNumber: Please enter a valid serial number (e.g., S/N-123456).
addFpsDetailsErrors.reference: Please enter a valid reference number (e.g., REF-98765).
addFpsDetailsErrors.location: Please enter a valid detection location.
addFpsDetailsErrors.detectedBy: Please select who detected the issue.
addFpsDetailsErrors.defectiveQuantity: Please enter a valid defective quantity.
addFpsDetailsErrors.customerRisk: Please select a valid customer risk option.
addFpsDetailsErrors.notifiedTeams: Please select at least one notified team.
addFpsDetailsErrors.immediateActions: Please describe immediate actions taken (minimum 10 characters).
addFpsDetailsErrors.sortingRequired: Please select if sorting is required.
addFpsDetailsErrors.sortingBy: Please select who handled the sorting.
addFpsDetailsErrors.restartTime: Please enter a valid restart time (HH:MM).
addFpsDetailsErrors.causeCategory: Please select a valid root cause category.
addFpsDetailsErrors.whyNotDetected: Please explain why the issue wasn't detected earlier.
addFpsDetailsErrors.correctiveActions: Please describe permanent corrective actions (minimum 10 characters).
addFpsDetailsErrors.standardImprovement: Please select if standard improvement is needed.
addFpsDetailsErrors.correctiveResponsible: Please select responsible person(s) for corrective actions.
addFpsDetailsErrors.teamAwareness: Please select a valid time option.
addFpsDetailsErrors.validationActions: Please select a valid time option.
addFpsDetailsErrors.signatures: Please select a valid signature option.
addFpsDetailsErrors.escalationNeeded: Please select if escalation is needed.

login.title: Log in Account
login.forgot_password_text:
If you need to reset your password, please contact your system administrator at [admin@example.com] or call [+123 456 7890].

For security reasons, only the administrator is authorized to manage password changes.
login.email_pattern_error: Invalid email format. Please use a standard email address (example: name@domain.com).
login.password_pattern_error: Password must contain at least 8 characters with one lowercase, one uppercase, one number, and one special character.
login.connection_error: Connection error. Please check your internet and try again.
login.access_denied: Access denied. Only operational users are allowed to log in.

noInternet.noInternet_message: It looks like you're offline. Please check your internet connection and try again.

scanner.scan_message: Scan the QR code inside the square to mark your arrival and start your task

scannerPermission.permissionDenied: Camera access is required to scan QR codes
scannerPermission.permissionInstructions: You previously denied camera access. Please enable it in your device settings.

ConfirmScan.title: Successfully Checked In!
ConfirmScan.subTitle: Thanks for being on time! Let’s get to work.

aboutApp.description: ARA Solutions is a smart platform designed to streamline manufacturing operations. It helps teams diagnose failures, report anomalies, and resolve issues quickly. With real-time alerts, data analysis, and easy integration with systems like SAP, our app boosts efficiency and supports continuous improvement — all through a user-friendly interface.

key_features.1_1: Quickly identify and resolve machine failures with advanced diagnostic tools.
key_features.1_2: Report and track anomalies in real-time to prevent production disruptions.
key_features.1_3: Manage QRAPs (Quick Response Action Plans) for fast and effective issue resolution.
key_features.1_4: Access detailed reports and analytics to drive continuous improvement.
key_features.1_5: Stay informed with instant alerts for critical issues and task updates.
key_features.1_6: Intuitive design for easy navigation and seamless user experience.
key_features.1_7: Connect with existing systems for streamlined operations and data management.

why_choose_us.1_1: Developed by industry leaders with decades of experience in manufacturing and digital transformation.
why_choose_us.1_2: Designed to meet the needs of small teams and large enterprises alike.
why_choose_us.1_3: Dedicated customer support to ensure your success at every step.
why_choose_us.1_4: Leveraging the latest advancements in AI and IoT for smarter operations.

our_mission.1_1: Providing innovative tools that help manufacturing teams boost productivity and streamline workflows.
our_mission.1_2: Driving improvements in product quality through smart, data-driven solutions.
our_mission.1_3: Minimizing production delays with predictive insights and real-time monitoring.
our_mission.1_4: Turning operational challenges into opportunities for sustainable business growth.
our_mission.1_5: Building strong partnerships by aligning our solutions with your unique goals.
